preferences.name: updateInterval
preferences.title: Update Interval
preferences.description: Interval of the addon checking wether a stream is live in seconds. When 0, the states aren't automatically updated.

preferences.name: onlineNotification
preferences.title: Show a notification when a stream goes online

preferences.name: titleChangeNotification
preferences.title: Show a notification when a stream changes the title

preferences.name: offlineNotification
preferences.title: Show a notification when a stream goes offline

preferences.name: nonliveNotification
preferences.title: Show a notification when a stream enters a non-live state
preferences.description: This option is only relevant, when non-live streams aren't considered as live or offline.

preferences.name: panel_nonlive
preferences.title: Treat non-live streams as
preferences.description: Non-live streams include things like hosted channels or rebroadcasts.

preferences.name: panel_extras
preferences.title: Extra info in panel
preferences.description: Displays the viewer count and the category name of a channel in the panel when availble.

preferences.name: panel_badge
preferences.title: Display counter badge
preferences.description: Displays the number of live channels on the button if any.

preferences.name: copy_pattern
preferences.title: Stream URL copy pattern
preferences.description: Customize the string that gets copied with the copy stream URL action in the panel context menu. {URL} gets replaced with the stream URL.

preferences.name: updateTab
preferences.title: Open a tab with update info after an update
preferences.description: A tab with informations about new features is opened when the extension is updated.

preferences.name: twitch_showHosting
preferences.title: Check if a Twitch Channel is hosting

preferences.name: twitch_showPlaylist
preferences.title: Show channels replaying recordings from a playlist as live

preferences.name: channellist_cacheTime
preferences.title: Time to cache channel states while Firefox is closed

preferences.name: queueservice_maxRetries
preferences.title: Maximum number of attempts before a request is discarded

preferences.name: find_mature
preferences.title: Find mature content in the explore tab

scripts.test: npm run lint && webpack && grunt test && jpm test --addon-dir build/ && grunt after-coverage
scripts.build: webpack && grunt build && jpm xpi --addon-dir build/
scripts.run: webpack && grunt dev && jpm run --addon-dir build/
